description:
Tomoharu returns to the second world as an Asura Cryin` due to his contract with Kanade. However, with the GD`s in a state of ruin and the absence of Shuri, Tomoharu realizes he lacks the power to defeat Tokiya, a man determined to create the third world even if it destroys the second. As Tomoharu prepares for the gate to open in 10 days, Reishiro and Yo suddenly appoint him president of the third student council. Still in shock from the surprising turn of events, Tomoharu hardens his resolve when Yo tells him to do what he must.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi e no Omoi wa Sekai o Kowasu
My Feelings for You Will Destroy This World
君への想いが世界を壊す
